item.title: Dynamic Config Modding
item.description: Since version 0.4.0, Viash supports modifying a viash config YAML at runtime using a custom DSL. This allows making dynamic changes to your components or projects. All Viash subcommands have support for the DSL through the -c|--config_mod parameter. The easiest way to explain is perhaps by showing some examples. The following statements are all valid under the DSL definition. Changing the version of a component: .functionality.version := "0.3.0" Changing the registry of docker containers.
